thread.title: Excellent hotel near the city centre
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel near the city centre - Review of Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Tomaskrcka
title: Excellent hotel near the city centre
text:
All the staff were very friendly and helpful, the room was very small but comfy and clean. Breakfast- I can honestly say every morning we woke up looking forward to breakfast!
The location was brilliant a few minutes walk to subway. We definitely come back.
